recommendations: Deepak Singh â€œAbha is an example of someone that if you improve yourself 1% everyday through sheer hard work & determination, you can transform yourself into someone someone who can be such a valuable contributor to the world, be an ever-increasing valuable asset. She is known for her energy & passion, her understanding of Startup Ecosystem is unmatched by people her age. She is dedicated & hardworking individual who is always ready to take new responsibilities, go beyond her official duties and venture into the unknown with Enthusiasm, a must for any Entrepreneur. She has demonstrated excellent improvement in her Leadership skills from her time working in digital marketing at Kosh to now helping Startups in fundraising in her own venture. She is a quick learner, always ready to take feedback, and work on improving any aspect that she can. As a leader, her listening skills, and ability to take suggestions from her junior and turn in into actionable ideas is commendable. Abha is an Entrepreneur by Passion, and Profession both and will definitely put a dent in the Universe.â€
Dhruv Javeri â€œAbha is very energetic and passionate enthusiast who understands the pulse of startups and itâ€™s ecosystem very well. Pleasant personality to work with.â€
